OrgName: Demand Media, Inc. and its controlled subsidiaries (excluding eNom, Inc)
activities: Demand Media, Inc. operates a number of websites. This safe harbor pertains to those sites in which Demand Media takes personally identifiable information (PII). An example of a Demand Media privacy policy is as follows: http://www.demandmedia.com/privacy-policy/. This Privacy Policy ("Privacy Policy" or the "Policy") sets out how we use and process your personal information (meaning any information about you which is personally identifiable or can be related back to you like your name, date of birth, address, telephone number, email address and queries) ("PII") that we collect about you when you use the services we provide on our many sites.
contacttitle1: Senior Director, Business and Legal Affairs
